title: Ep. 425 - Democrats Are Doing Everything Wrong
description:
As Democrats in Congress burn down their 2020 frontrunner, give Trump a major fundraising advantage, and scare away independent voters, a serious question arises: are Democrats trying to lose this thing? We examine why the Left can’t get anything right. Then, an Obama-appointed federal judge rules that Asians aren’t being discriminated against at Harvard—they just have terrible personalities—and the Washington Post gives us the dumbest article on the Internet today. Date: 10-02-2019
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
